trans-unit.resname: There was a problem validating your password reset request
trans-unit.source: There was a problem validating your password reset request
trans-unit.target: Hubo un problema al validar tu solicitud de restablecimiento de contraseña

trans-unit.resname: There was a problem handling your password reset request
trans-unit.source: There was a problem handling your password reset request
trans-unit.target: Hubo un problema al procesar tu solicitud de restablecimiento de contraseña

trans-unit.resname: The link in your email is expired. Please try to reset your password again.
trans-unit.source: The link in your email is expired. Please try to reset your password again.
trans-unit.target: El enlace en tu correo electrónico ha expirado. Por favor, intenta restablecer tu contraseña nuevamente.

trans-unit.resname: Please update the request_password_repository configuration in config/packages/reset_password.yaml to point to your "request password repository" service.
trans-unit.source: Please update the request_password_repository configuration in config/packages/reset_password.yaml to point to your "request password repository" service.
trans-unit.target: Por favor, actualiza la configuración de request_password_repository en config/packages/reset_password.yaml para apuntar a tu servicio "request password repository"

trans-unit.resname: The reset password link is invalid. Please try to reset your password again.
trans-unit.source: The reset password link is invalid. Please try to reset your password again.
trans-unit.target: El enlace de restablecimiento de contraseña no es válido. Por favor, intenta restablecer tu contraseña nuevamente.

trans-unit.resname: You have already requested a reset password email. Please check your email or try again soon.
trans-unit.source: You have already requested a reset password email. Please check your email or try again soon.
trans-unit.target: Ya has solicitado un correo electrónico de restablecimiento de contraseña. Por favor, revisa tu correo electrónico o intenta nuevamente pronto.
